text: {{Infobox person | name = Sumitra Peries | imagesize = | birth_date = | birth_place = Avissawella, British Ceylon | death_date = | death_place = Colombo, Sri Lanka | spouse = Lester James Peries (1964–2018) }} "Kala Keerthi" Sumitra Peries (24 March 1934 – 19 January 2023)Veteran Sri Lankan filmmaker Sumitra Peries passes away is a Sri Lankan movie director and diplomat. She is known as the "Poetess of Sinhala Cinema". She also held the post of Sri Lanka's ambassador to France, Spain and the United Nations in the late 1990s. Her best known works are Gehenu Lamai, Ganga Addara and Yahaluvo. She was married to director Dr. Lester James Peries. ==References== ==Other websites== * Female genius behind the camera *Official Website of Lester James Peries in association with Ministry of Cultural Affairs, Sri Lanka Category:1934 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Sri Lankan movie directors Category:Ambassadors to the United Nations Category:Ambassadors to France
